name: Bass Brigade Urban Wilderness Crew Neck Sweatshirt - Black
description: Nothing says more about you than this graphic on your chest. From shore pounding the city lakes to navigating deep canyon reservoirs, following your own path, you're sure to make a statement in the urban wilderness. Our crew pullover sweatshirt is made with premium soft midweight fabric and a generous fit for the utmost comfort. A standard supply crew neck of timeless design. Woven label stitched on lower left front. • 8.5 oz. pre-laundered 75% cotton 25% polyester blend fleece • 100% cotton 20 singles face yarn for supreme softness • 1x1 ribbing at collar, cuffs and waistband • Split stitch double needle sewing on all seams • Twill neck tape FREE Ground Shipping on orders over $50 or more. US Only. International orders, please inquire within. intl@bassbrigade.com

name: Bass Brigade Lip Ripper Tee - Black
description: Our tribute tee of the iconic graphic "Rip the Ripper" created by V.C. Johnson which has been immortalized in the skate/street culture. An image representing an era when the boundaries and limitations of skateboarding were forever changed by a group of hardcore teenagers who lived with purpose and passion for the sport they loved. Our "Lip Ripper" tee stands as inspiration for every brigadier whose taking themselves and their gear to another level of bass fishing greatness. "In omnia paratus." Ready for anything. This garment made with premium quality pre-shrunk cotton and fit. 100% freshness on and off the water. Bass Brigade Shield Logo label hit on front and back neck.
